basics.name: Bartosz Jarocki
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary: As a Full Stack Engineer, I have successfully taken multiple products from 0 to 1. I lead teams effectively, ensuring an environment where people can do their best work. Currently, I work mostly with TypeScript, React, Node.js, and GraphQL. I have over 8 years of experience in working remotely with companies all around the world.

work.name: Parabol
work.summary: Implemented new features, led squad, worked on improving the way developers ship the code, started migration from Emotion to Tailwind CSS and more. Technologies: React, TypeScript, GraphQL

work.name: Clevertech
work.position: Lead Android Developer → Full Stack Developer
work.summary: Created Android mobile apps and led teams for companies like Vision Media, DKMS, or AAA. Built live streaming application for Evercast from scratch. Technologies: Android, Kotlin, React, TypeScript, GraphQL

work.name: Jojo Mobile
work.summary: Built an Android team, created Android apps for biggest Polish companies like LOT, Polskie Radio, Agora, PolskaPress

work.name: Nokia Siemens Networks
work.summary: Creating and testing software for LTE base stations
